longBusinessSummary: Molson Coors Canada Inc. brews, markets, sells, and distributes various beer brands in the Americas, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Asia-Pacific, Canada, and internationally. The company offers its products under the AC Golden, Aguila, Apantinsko, AriZona Hard, Arnold Palmer Spiked, Aspall, Astika, Atwater Brewery, Barmen Pilsner, Bavaria, Bella Amari, Bergenbier, Bergenbier Non-Alcoholic, Birra Roma, Black Horse, Black Ice, Blue Moon, Bodega Bay, Bohemian, Borsodi, Branik, Brasseur de Montréal, Burgasko, Caffrey's, Carling, Carling Cider, Cobra, Colorado Native, Cool, Coors Banquet, Coors Original, Coors Seltzer, Coors Slice, Coors Whiskey Company, Creemore Springs, Cristal, Cusqueña, Fine Company, Franciscan Well, Fresh, George Killian's Irish Red, Golden Wing, Granville Island Brewing, Griff, Grolsch, Hamm's, Henry Weinhard's Gourmet Sodas, Herman Joseph's Private Reserve, Hop Valley, India Beer, Jelen, Kamenitza, Kamenitza Non-Alcoholic, Laurentide, Leinenkugel's, Lixir Drinks, and Foster's brands. It also provides its products under the Madrí Excepcional, Miami Cocktail Company, Mickey's, Miller Chill, Miller Genuine Draft, Miller64 Extra Light, Milwaukee's Best, Molson Canadian, Molson Canadian Cold Shots, Molson Stock Ale, Molson Ultra, Nikicko, Old Vienna, Olde English 800, Ostravar, Oujsko, Pardubický Pivovar, Peace Hard Tea, Peroni, Praha, Pravha, Rákóczi, Redd's Hard Apple, Redd's Wicked, Rekorderlig, Revolver Brewing, Rickard's, Riesenbrau, Roxie, Sharp's, Simply Spiked, Sol Cerveza, Standard Lager, Staropramen, Staropramen Non-Alcoholic, Steel Reserve Alloy Series, Steel Reserve High Gravity, Sunny Provisions, Tarquin's, Terrapin, Topo Chico Hard Seltzer, Topo Chico Spirited, Trou Du Diable, Twin Fin, Vizzy Hard Seltzer, Vukovarsko, WAI, Zima, and ZOA brands. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Montreal, Canada. Molson Coors Canada Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Molson Coors Beverage Company.
